name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The driver involved in the accident was taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20, Xi'an, Shaanxi. Owners of Phase II of China Railway Excellence City protested against the reduction of standards and specifications and refused to accept the housing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 24, Qingdao police reported that three people were hospitalized for treatment in the accident, and none of them were in danger of death. The mixer truck driver was suspected of drunk driving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19, Wuhan, Hubei. Homeowners of Yunbo Riverside protested against the price cut of their property. According to statistics from a blogger, homeowners of 10 property projects in Wuhan were defending their rights in October, mainly because old owners were dissatisfied with the price cut.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 18, Shenyang, Liaoning. Workers protested against Ruijia Construction Company for unpaid wages.
October 21, Hefei, Anhui. The owners of Heshun Poly Yuexiu and Yueyunjin protested against poor quality.
October 21, Nanning, Guangxi. The owners of Greenland Langfeng protested against the unfinished project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 21, Jinan, Shandong. CITIC Pacific is urging property owners to protest against false propaganda, reduced standards and simplified configurations, and shoddy products.
October 20, Harbin, Heilongjiang. The owners of Jinyuan Blue City protested against the continuous power outage in the community for more than 24 hours, but the property management company refused to solve the problem or explain the cause of the problem.
On October 22, migrant workers at Country Garden Huiyuetai in Huizhou, Guangdong, begged for wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, in Xi'an, Shaanxi, the owners of Qinhan New City in Xixian New District protested that the shops they bought next to the Qinhan Management Committee had been left unfinished for ten years without anyone paying attention.
On October 23, the owners of Xiangsheng Mansion in Aolai, Hengyang, Hunan, held banners to protest against the unfinished buildings.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, in Wuhan, Hubei, owners of Fuxing Huiyu Chenjing gathered to protest and shouted "move out". It is reported that the property was launched at 22,000 yuan per square meter that year, and now the price has dropped to 15,000 yuan. The video blogger said that buying a 100-square-meter house is equivalent to losing 700,000 yuan in just a few years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on October 22, the use of WhatsApp, Gmail and cloud software will be prohibited on computers in Hong Kong government offices this month. Hong Kong officials said that mobile devices such as mobile phones will not be affected.
Netizens responded, "I am no longer qualified to laugh at the mainland, the welfare is the same", "Press the accelerator to the bottom", "The security of the regime is the greatest security"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 13 (Released) Japan. A man shared his feelings after coming to Japan: The police will not check my ID card, I can enter the city hall at will, there is no security check in the subway, and there are very few cameras. And when I go to the city hall to do business, the security guards will serve you warmly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, it was revealed online that Shenzhen Futian Xinhua Primary School fed students frozen chicken that was four years expired. "The chicken was smelly. The school discovered the problem last year and then just dealt with it superficially."
Education Bureau: It is being handled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 23, Guangdong. Netizens posted on Xiaohongshu: What pseudo-developed countries do you think are?
In the comment area, many netizens answered Japan and South Korea, "The first reaction is South Korea" and "Japan is now not even as good as South Korea"

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: October 23 (Released) Jiangxi. A man posted a video saying that last year, his son Xu Zhiyong was stabbed to death by a 15-year-old neighbor. Afterwards, the murderer stood outside the door and calmly played with his smart watch. It has been a year since the incident, and the murderer's parents have not yet come forward to give an explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 23 (Released) Ukraine released a video persuading North Korean soldiers to surrender, saying that if they surrender, they can eat meat three times a day. Ukraine recently released a video calling on North Korean soldiers to surrender. The video called in Korean, "You will be placed in a warm room" and "We will provide three meals a day, including meat and fresh vegetables."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 24, Independence Square in Kiev, Ukraine.
Some Chinese people spontaneously came to the square to lay flowers and write Chinese blessing slogans to mourn the sacrifice of the Ukrainian soldiers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 23 (Released) An old man from Daliang Mountain, Sichuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 24, a car crashed into pedestrians in front of the gate of Jingdezhen University in Jiangxi Province. According to people familiar with the matter, four college students were hit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of October 23, a fire broke out in the carport of Building 4 of Beiyuan Student Dormitory, Gaomi Campus, Qingdao University of Science and Technology.
Students posted a long article questioning that there were no smoke alarms in the corridors, and the students who woke up had to wake each other up to take shelter, and the fire escape was also locked. If the fire spread, the consequences would be disastrous.
After the fire broke out, the school did not comfort the students at the first time, but urgently sealed it up. And the school did not provide any compensation for the personal belongings burned in the dormitory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The old man, who was lying in the garbage heap and groaning in pain, died on October 20.
The old man lived in Xiaoliu Village, Guantun Town, Qinhuangdao. He was 67 years old and suffered from polio. He made a living by picking up waste. The old man was a five-guarantee household in the village, with a monthly subsidy of 300 to 500 yuan. After being bedridden, he contacted many local relief agencies, but was rejected by all of them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 23, Guangdong. A man interviewed roadside sanitation workers about their wages. The workers said they were paid 80 yuan a day, but no salary during breaks. They were not provided with food, accommodation or social security, and 35 yuan of insurance was deducted from their wages every month.
The day after the video was released, the man received a call from the relevant department, who asked him to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 23, Guangdong. Reporter interviewed primary school students: Who is your idol?
Students answered: Elon Musk, because he never gives up even when he encounters setbacks, he dares to innovate and pursue perfection, and uses his wealth to benefit mankind.
Netizens replied: Colonizing people should start from childhood, it seems that patriotic education has a long way to go.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Israeli military issued a statement on October 22 saying that Hashim Saffieddin, a senior leader of Hezbollah in Lebanon, and Ali Hussein Hazema, commander of the intelligence headquarters, were killed in an airstrike launched by the Israeli army earlier this month. So far, the Israeli army has confirmed that all 13 senior Hezbollah leaders have been killed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man who joined the army in Russia posted a video complaining that he had to walk more than ten kilometers carrying dozens of kilograms of equipment. "There are still people in China who want to come here, but they are all exhausted like dogs, suffering from acclimatization, vomiting and diarrhea." "If you suffer here, happiness will not come, but those who want to kill you will come."
